figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: The performance of FER ability between study groups.

figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: The performance of disgust FER ability between study groups.

figure_3.title: Figure 3.
figure_3.caption: The mediation model of the executive function, attention, and FER.

The performance of FER ability between study groups.Figure 2.
However, we found a significant difference between the three study groups in the total score on Subtest 4 (P = .001; Fig. 1).
The post hoc revealed that the PD-NC and HC groups had similar scores, and the PD-MCI group had the lowest score in the “disgust” index (Fig. 2).

Mediation model
After knowing that most domain indicators of cognitive function predicted “disgust” FER performance in subtest 4, we proceeded with a mediation analysis (Table 6 and Fig. 3).
